2002480.name: Home Solo Car Racer
2002480.description:
It's a small toy car home racing game with 51 indoor levels.
You are alone in the game. it's a single player game. But with the option to save multiple user profiles.
The ambiance in the game is calm and relaxing, with a modern indoor architecture style.
As the name indicates you should play the levels many times to get better record times.
It's a 51 level racing game to find the checkpoints and do the needed laps to the finish line.
- BabyBroRoom
- StudyRoom
- GrannysRoom
- LivingRoom
- KidBroBedRoom
- Kitchen
- GrandadsRoom
- DiningRoom
- SistersRoom
- ParentsRoom
- Bathroom
- Garage A
- Garage B
- Home_GYM
- GreatGrandes
- Caravan
- Laundry
- Terrace
- Basement
...Have fun and enjoy the music! "check the music in the video".
